scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && cp -r public dist/ && cp src/scripts/*.js dist/scripts
scripts.run-automate:macos: yarn build && yarn kill && yarn start:nowatch && open http://localhost:3000
scripts.start:macos: nodemon --watch src --watch public  --watch .env --ext js,ts,html,css,json,.env --ignore ./dist --ignore ./node_modules --exec yarn run-automate:macos
scripts.start: nodemon --watch src --watch public  --watch .env --ext js,ts,html,css,json,.env --ignore ./dist --ignore ./node_modules --exec yarn run-automate
scripts.run-automate: yarn build && yarn kill && yarn start:nowatch
